head.name: CPG2430-grc-Guillaumonts+CPG2430-syr-BL14578.TAN-A.xml
The first TAN-A file created in the Text Alignment Protocol.

inclusion.name: Alignment of the works of Evagrius

bitext-relation.name: The first source is a critical edition of twenty-three key manuscripts that descend from an unknown number of relatives of the key manuscript or manuscripts that formed the basis for the translation that was either the second source, or for the copies that formed the basis of the second source.

head.change: Altered suffix, infix, prefix values to @char values
updated to suit changes in validation schema
Moved to new tag uri id.
Adjustments with addition of uses declaration.
Alterations in concert with schema edits.
head.comment: This is the first TAN-A file, used to model the schema.
